intro: Hemitelia minuscula, commonly known as the small hemitelia, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in clusters. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a smooth texture. Hemitelia minuscula is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
